description: Second differences of sigma(n) that are positive.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with (numtheory): f := [seq( sigma(i+2) - sigma(i+1) - (sigma(i+1) - sigma(i)), i=1..200)];seq(`if`(f[i] > 0,f[i],print( )), i=1..200);
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Jan 11, 2000
